metadata.name: KANDI_002
metadata.description:
KANDI_002 is a VIP membership pass that grants access to the Sweetshop private members community, collective of brands and limited edition drops. Holders will get exclusive invites, experiences and rewards. Join our community of dreamers. 

This Membership is valid for 12 months, learn more [here](https://www.sweetshopmedia.com/drops)
